text:
Hello
 
I want to fetch all records from an object that match certain criterias into my dynamic landing page. Anybody came across a similar scenario?
 
Example:
If the record has property1=X and property2=Y, fetch this record and display it on the dynamic page.
 
 Thank you loads
This was solved, issue was i need to pass the id of the association label and not the id of the object

I want to send an email containing the line items of the triggered deal.

When using deal.line_items, the email is always being sent as the same "default deal".

If I have 2 deals with

• A / B
• C / D
The email will always show line item A / B no matter if the first deal or the second deal is enrolled in the workflow :confused:
